name: Whiz Blade
description:
Whiz Blade

This cursed blade goes out of control! 

Solve your way through the tower to cleanse your soul. Satiate the sword's blood-lust by ending the worthless lives of tower dwellers. 

Your accursed demon sword, the Whiz Blade, vehemently seeks out blood, no matter what obstacles lie before it. Use this to your advantage, or it will be your demise.

This game was created for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam, with the theme "out of control".

Good Luck!

Controls 

WASD/Arrow Keys: move

R: restart level

Obstacles

The Sword: will make you rocket towards the enemy that is in its direct line of sight

Enemies: Either avoid the enemies or use them to your advantage to fly through the level!

Spikes: The sword can see enemies through spikes, and dash towards them. You cannot survive running through the spikes, however

Pits: If you are walking normally, you will fall into a pit. If you are flying at an enemy, you will go over the pit. Pits can be filled with crates, and pits can be created after stepping on cracked ground

Gates: The sword can see through gates, but you cannot fit through.
The sword will charge towards enemies behind gates, forcing you to slam into the gate itself.

Objective: Get through the tower!

Team

Jaden Goter: programming lead

Zach Randolph: programming, level design

Erik Skoog: OST, sound, level design

Camden Obertop: art lead, game design

Matt Lowe: art

In-game font is Medieval Pixel by Goatmeal.
